full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI KHA CIG GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BTAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA GCIG BYAS MANG PO YOD PO DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BLZOG BSGYUR YIG SNYING RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GA' BSGRUB ZHING, SLAR YANG SMON PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM GROR DGOS PA CHED ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MA MCHOG PAR, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA PHAN PA AE SRID SNYAM PAS SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLUN PO SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS KYI BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS GSUNG RGYUN LA RTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: CHOS KYI BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN,
